item.description: As always we will discussing what ever issues are relevant to those attending. Please bring your business cards, resumes and questions. Look forward to seeing you there. I will be sitting in the dinning area since Trident no longer takes reservations for the back room. Look for the Meetup sign and me! My number is 617.319.6712 if you can't find me.

group.name: Boston Web Design (and Dev) Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Web Design December Meetup
